us.description:
Unlock your creative potential! Discover how to easily turn any Sun, Moon and Milky Way scene you imagine into a real picture… and start shooting truly legendary photos every time you pick up the camera!

Whether your passion is to capture beautiful landscapes, immortalize the infinite night sky, surprise the bride and the groom in their happiest day... or to travel the world, PhotoPills will make you love exploring new artistic possibilities to tell visual stories in a way it wasn’t possible before.

* All in one app
PhotoPills is your iPhone and iPad personal assistant in all photographic matters. It provides tasty remedies to answer most of the questions when planning and shooting your creative ideas: 
- The First 2D Map-Centric Planner: Sun, Moon, Milky Way
- Sun, Moon Alignments Fast Finder
- 3D Augmented Reality: Sun, Moon, Milky Way, Celestial Equator, Polaris, DoF, FoV
- Photo Plans Manager
- Location Scouting Tool
- Key information: Sunrise/set, Twilights, Golden Hour, Blue Hour, Moonrise/set, Supermoon dates, Moon Calendar
- Calculators: Long Exposure, Timelapse, Spot Stars, Star Trails, Hyperfocal Table, DoF, FoV
- Widgets: Sun, Moon, Milky Way
- PhotoPills Awards… and much more!

* Endorsed by Masters
“PhotoPills is an invaluable tool which I use every time I plan a shoot.” – Mark Gee, Astronomy Photographer of the Year.
“A tool every photographer should have.” – Kevin Raber, Luminous-landscape.com.
“It pays off! Using such a tool ensures that we are repeatedly capable of quickly planning powerful shots; leaving maximum opportunity for more creative ruminations.” – José B. Ruiz, Innovation Award, Wildlife Photographer of the Year.

* How it works
Have you ever walked around a place and thought: "What a pity the Moon isn't EXACTLY right there... I would have captured a great photo!"? What about the Sun? And the Milky Way? Well, now you can let your imagination fly and calculate when this specific magic moment happens in just a few seconds:
- IMAGINE: the Milky Way arching over a powerful landscape, a giant full Moon appearing from behind a nearby hill or a sunset between two rocks on a magic beach... The only limit is your imagination!
- PLAN: easily calculate the exact date and time the scene you’ve imagined happens. Work smarter, not harder! 
- SHOOT: just get out there, immerse yourself in the great outdoors, and enjoy living and capturing unique moments.

* Become a Legend
Because we know the huge amount of time, energy and love you put in your photos. We want to HONOR them, SHOW them to the World, and REWARD you with up to $6,600 in cash prizes. It's easy and FREE! Just submit your creative photos from PhotoPills and join the Legacy!

* Never waste an unmissable scene again
Create a To-Do list of planned photos and get to the location on time. 

* Get it right
Adjust your frame for the best composition before you shoot. Use the 3D Augmented Reality Views to see whether Sun, Moon and Milky Way will be at the desired position when pressing the shutter.

* Explore, discover great places and create your own database of locations
If you come across a location you’d like to remember, save it as a Point of Interest.

* Enjoy all daily information in just one swipe with the Widgets
Just swipe down from the top of the screen to get all the Sun, Moon and Milky Way events for your current location and date, in addition to your upcoming photo plans.

* Get more than an app
Our goal is not only to help you plan your shots, but also to help you nail them. Whenever you need help, take a look at our How-To articles and videos, join our free online courses or just contact us!

“This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You take the blue pill – the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take PhotoPills – you stay in Wonderland and we show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes. Remember: all we’re offering are Legendary Photos and Goosebumps in your skin, nothing more.”

us.description:
Get ready to jump into action and show the Kingdom who’s the real boss in the best tower defense game!

Face empires of mighty enemies. Clash against supreme bosses, unlocking and switching to new towers. Train legendary heroes and get all the achievements using your strategy in this amazing TD game.

Kingdom Rush Vengeance will give you hours and hours of gameplay in the best tower defense game available! 

Heroes, your Army, Enemies, and legendary td bossfights!
- 17 Powerful HEROES who will, without hesitation, rush into action at your command
- LEVEL UP YOUR HEROES  and upgrade their abilities
- 10+ TRINKETS AND ARTEFACTS for that extra action in battle.
- NEW POWERS AND REINFORCEMENTS to vanquish your foes, td style!
- 30 UPGRADES to train your army to their best form.
- 60+ DEADLY ENEMIES that will put all of your wit and strategic skills to the test
- RUSH TO SAVE THE KINGDOM as you bring down 6 mighty bosses in the most legendary boss fights!

Epic Selection of Towers and Upgrades
- 22 NEW TOWERS to defend your kingdom
- UNIQUE ABILITIES AND SPECIAL POWER for every tower
- Choose your arsenal of towers and execute your strategy. 

Create devastating combinations of towers, abilities and special powers to stop your enemies!

Near Endless Tower Defense Gameplay

- 42 CHALLENGING STAGES that will test your skills
- 9 DIFFERENT REALMS to conquer and explore
- EXPLORE new lands in the Kingdom
- 60+ ACHIEVEMENTS, hidden secrets, and fun stuff for you to play and discover while you explore the realm!
- UNLOCK HEROIC AND IRON CHALLENGES on all stages
- CASUAL, NORMAL, VETERAN OR IMPOSSIBLE difficulty for every level
- Summon enemy waves faster to earn additional gold

Time for some Royal Vengeance in the Kingdom!
Vez’nan, the powerful almighty wizard has returned. 

Lead your powerful dark army and make the Kingdom tremble with each step. Help Vez’nan conquer new lands in the kingdom! 

Orcs, goblins, demons, dark knights, zombies, and many more! Choose your favorites and mix them to find the most deadly tower defense combination - secure the crown of the kingdom for Vez’nan.

Awesome Offline Tower Defense Game

No Wi-Fi at your Dark Tower?

- PLAY ANYWHERE - playing offline works, if your wifi doesn’t
- PLAY OFFLINE - no internet connection required
- You can play Kingdom Rush Vengeance as your offline TD game of choice. 


--------------------------------------------------

HEARD ON THE MEDIA:
"For veteran Kingdom Rush players and newcomers alike, the charm and strategy of the franchise remains with Kingdom Rush: Vengeance, making it one of the best mobile games of 2018!"
-Polygon

"Kingdom Rush Vengeance is the biggest and baddest the series has been."
-148Apps

"Players with any affinity for tower-defense games are going to enjoy every second they spend with Kingdom Rush Vengeance!"
-Pocket gamer

"The game is intensely engaging with a light-hearted tone that makes it a real pleasure to jump into."
-Pocket tactics

us.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

us.description:
Featured by Apple on the US and Canada App Store. Enjoy a one-time purchase with lifetime access—no subscription required.
EXIF Viewer by Fluntro is the ultimate tool for professional photographers and iPhone enthusiasts to view, manage, and edit EXIF metadata. With a sleek design and seamless functionality, this app offers a harmonious experience across all your iOS devices (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch).

Key Features:
• Remove EXIF Metadata and Geotagging: Safeguard your privacy by effortlessly deleting EXIF data, including GPS location.
• View Detailed EXIF Data: Easily access essential metadata such as ISO, Shutter Speed, Focal Length, Camera Model, Lens Model, Timestamp and more from any photo on your device, iCloud, or Photo Stream.
• Zoom in on Large Photos: Enjoy high-resolution images (up to 80 MB) with crystal clarity.
• Customize Your EXIF Tags: Personalize your viewing experience by reordering EXIF tags, hiding unwanted tags, and selecting your preferred date format.
• Quick Navigation: Smoothly swipe left or right to navigate between photos in the EXIF detail screen.
• Map View: Visualize your photos on a map with detailed EXIF information accessible by tapping on each photo.
• Bulk Edit EXIF Data: Efficiently modify EXIF metadata for multiple photos, including date and location changes.
• Share Photos with or without EXIF: Seamlessly share photos via email, AirDrop, or other methods, with or without EXIF metadata.
• Copy EXIF Data: Copy and share metadata across apps with ease.
• Retain EXIF Metadata: Photos sent via Mail, AirDrop, or SD Card readers retain EXIF metadata, unlike most messaging and social networking apps.

Additional Features:
• 3D Touch Support: Quickly access actions like Favorites, Albums, or All Photos on supported iPhones.
• Optimized for All iOS Devices: Compatible with iPad Pro, iPhone SE, iPhone 8, and newer models in both landscape and portrait modes.
• Multiple Viewing Options: Choose from EXIF Cards List View, Grid View, or Map View to suit your preference.
• Photos Extension: Access EXIF data directly within the native Photos app or third-party apps by selecting the photo and tapping the Share button to choose the EXIF Viewer extension.
• iMessage App Support: Effortlessly view and share EXIF data in your messages.

Editing and Removing EXIF Metadata:
• Bulk Edit EXIF Data: Select multiple photos, tap “Edit EXIF,” and update metadata such as date and location.
• Remove EXIF Metadata:
    1.    Overwrite the original photo to eliminate EXIF metadata.
    2.    Create a duplicate photo without EXIF data, with an option to delete the original photo.

FAQ
What is EXIF Metadata?
EXIF stands for EXchangeable Image File Format. When you take pictures with your digital camera or phone, a considerable amount of EXIF data is recorded and stored within each image. This data includes information about your camera settings (ISO, focal length, image size, shutter speed, camera model, lens model, GPS), date, time, location, and more. Viewing EXIF metadata tags is crucial for both beginners and professional photographers to understand and review the camera settings or software used to create and edit a photo.

Why Choose EXIF Viewer by Fluntro?
• No In-App Purchases: Enjoy all current and future features with the initial purchase—no hidden costs.
• Designed for Professional Photographers: Gain deep insights into your photography work and protect your privacy by removing sensitive metadata.
• Privacy First: Your photos are securely stored locally on your phone and never uploaded to our servers. Learn more in our Privacy Policy.

User Reviews:
If you’re satisfied with the app, please consider leaving a 5-star review. Your feedback helps us improve and ensures the best experience for all users.

us.description:
Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors.

UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES
Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat.

WHAT IT DOES
• Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around
• Custom redirects (e.g. reddit → old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns
• Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them
• Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services
• Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more

WHY IT'S USEFUL
Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services.

TRACKING BLOCKER
Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices.

URL REDIRECTS
Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported.

SEARCH ARCHIVE
One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device.

iCLOUD SYNC
Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, and tweaks sync automatically and immediately. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere (statistics remain device-specific).

BROWSER TWEAKS
Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere.

KEY FEATURES
• Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac
• Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection)
• Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity
• Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically
• Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps
• Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules
• Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users
• Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering
• Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity
• Works offline - no internet connection required

DESIGN PRINCIPLES
Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms.

IMPORTANT NOTES
Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental.

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK
Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues

PRIVACY
No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device.

EULA
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE?
Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

us.description:
A remodeled 2D take on the fourth game in the world-renowned FINAL FANTASY series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics. All the magic of the original, with improved ease of play.

The Kingdom of Baron sent their elite airship fleet, the Red Wings, to attack the surrounding countries. Distressed by his mission, Cecil, a dark knight and captain of the Red Wings, decides to fight against the tyrannical Baron with his trusted friend and his paramour at his side. In his search for the crystals, Cecil must travel over land, under the ground, to the Land of Summons, and even to the moon. Join forces with Kain the dragoon, Rosa the white mage, Rydia the summoner, and many more skilled allies.

FFIV is the first title to introduce the dynamic "Active Time Battle" system, where time moves even during battle, giving the players an exciting sense of urgency.Thanks to the wide appeal of the game, this revolutionary system would be implemented in many future titles in the series.

Witness the dramatic story and dynamic battles in this fourth installment of the FINAL FANTASY series!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

■ Beautifully revived with new graphics and sound!
・Universally updated 2D pixel graphics, including the iconic FINAL FANTASY character pixel designs created by Kazuko Shibuya, the original artist and current collaborator.
・Beautifully rearranged soundtrack in a faithful FINAL FANTASY style, overseen by original composer Nobuo Uematsu.

■Improved gameplay!
・Including modernized UI, auto-battle options, and more.
・Also supports game pad controls, making it possible to play using a dedicated gamepad UI when connecting a gamepad to your device.
・Switch the soundtrack between the rearranged version, created for the pixel remaster, or the original version, capturing the sound of the original game.
・Now possible to switch between different fonts, including the default font and a pixel-based font based on the atmosphere of the original game.
・Additional boost features to expand gameplay options, including switching off random encounters and adjusting experience gained multipliers between 0 and 4.
・Dive into the world of the game with supplemental extras like the bestiary, illustration gallery, and music player.

*One-time purchase. The app will not require any additional payments to play through the game after the initial purchase and subsequent download.
*This remaster is based on the original "FINAL FANTASY IV" game released in 1991. Features and/or content may differ from previously rereleased versions of the game.

[OS Compatibility]
iOS 13.0 or higher

[Applicable Devices]
iPhone 7 Plus, iPad (7th generation), iPad Air (3rd generation), iPad mini (5th generation) and higher

想系統的學習日語嗎? 那就從這開始吧。 

本軟體是一款學習類應用，循序漸進的收錄了25課初級有聲課程和25課進階有聲教程，包含單詞,句型,會話,語法和課後聽力五個部分，音頻和視頻全部高清重制。通過手機的移動性便攜性，幫助各界朋友隨時隨地的學習和查閱教材的內容，使各個層次的學習者都能夠迅速的強化日語的聽說讀寫能力。 

在每課的單詞部分，會有對該課單詞的簡單練習，可以順序或隨機的進行日譯中,中譯日或聽力測試,對單詞的記憶有著非常好的幫助。 每個單詞均支持3D按壓，可以通過按壓進行在線翻譯。

所有單詞可按五星等級進行收藏，方便您經常摘錄重點或難以記憶的單詞,以便反復練習和查閱。 支持單詞收藏雲同步，可以讓您在不同設備之間無縫切換。
     
會話可隱藏指定角色對話內容來進行角色扮演。另附有真人視頻增強日語學習語境。 
       
全文朗讀功能，可一鍵朗讀課文的單詞、文型、例文、會話部分，方便在出門或忙碌時練習聽力。可線控暫停和繼續播放，可線控進行下一段和上一段跳轉。 

支持Spotlight，可在手機主頁直接下拉搜索欄進行單詞搜索並直接跳轉。

Face empires of mighty enemies. Clash against supreme bosses, unlocking and switching to new towers. Train legendary heroes and get all the achievements using your strategy in this amazing TD game.

Kingdom Rush Vengeance will give you hours and hours of gameplay in the best tower defense game available! 

Heroes, your Army, Enemies and legendary td bossfights!
- 17 Powerful HEROES who will, without hesitation, rush into action at your command
- LEVEL UP YOUR HEROES  and upgrade their abilities
- 10+ TRINKETS AND ARTEFACTS for that extra action in battle.
- NEW POWERS AND REINFORCEMENTS to vanquish your foes, td style!
- 30 UPGRADES to train your army to their best form.
- 60+ DEADLY ENEMIES that will put all of your wit and strategic skills to the test
- RUSH TO SAVE THE KINGDOM as you bring down 6 mighty bosses in the most legendary boss fights!

Epic Selection of Towers and Upgrades
- 22 NEW TOWERS to defend your kingdom
- UNIQUE ABILITIES AND SPECIAL POWER for every tower
- Choose your arsenal of towers and execute your strategy. 

Create devastating combinations of towers, abilities and special powers to stop your enemies!

Near Endless Tower Defense Gameplay

- 42 CHALLENGING STAGES that will test your skills
- 9 DIFFERENT REALMS to conquer and explore
- EXPLORE new lands in the Kingdom
- 60+ ACHIEVEMENTS, hidden secrets, and fun stuff for you to play and discover while you explore the realm!

- CASUAL, NORMAL, VETERAN OR IMPOSSIBLE difficulty for every level

Time for some Royal Vengeance in the Kingdom!

Lead your powerful dark army and make the Kingdom tremble with each step. Help Vez’nan conquer new lands in the kingdom! 

Orcs, goblins, demons, dark knights, zombies and many more! Choose your favorites and mix them to find the most deadly tower defense combination - secure the crown of the kingdom for Vez’nan.

Awesome Offline Tower Defense Game

tr.description:
Featured by Apple on the US and Canada App Store. Enjoy a one-time purchase with lifetime access—no subscription required.
EXIF Viewer by Fluntro is the ultimate tool for professional photographers and iPhone enthusiasts to view, manage, and edit EXIF metadata. With a sleek design and seamless functionality, this app offers a harmonious experience across all your iOS devices (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch).

Key Features:
• Remove EXIF Metadata and Geotagging: Safeguard your privacy by effortlessly deleting EXIF data, including GPS location.
• View Detailed EXIF Data: Easily access essential metadata such as ISO, Shutter Speed, Focal Length, Camera Model, Lens Model, Timestamp and more from any photo on your device, iCloud, or Photo Stream.
• Zoom in on Large Photos: Enjoy high-resolution images (up to 80 MB) with crystal clarity.
• Customize Your EXIF Tags: Personalize your viewing experience by reordering EXIF tags, hiding unwanted tags, and selecting your preferred date format.
• Quick Navigation: Smoothly swipe left or right to navigate between photos in the EXIF detail screen.
• Map View: Visualize your photos on a map with detailed EXIF information accessible by tapping on each photo.
• Bulk Edit EXIF Data: Efficiently modify EXIF metadata for multiple photos, including date and location changes.
• Share Photos with or without EXIF: Seamlessly share photos via email, AirDrop, or other methods, with or without EXIF metadata.
• Copy EXIF Data: Copy and share metadata across apps with ease.
• Retain EXIF Metadata: Photos sent via Mail, AirDrop, or SD Card readers retain EXIF metadata, unlike most messaging and social networking apps.

Additional Features:
• 3D Touch Support: Quickly access actions like Favorites, Albums, or All Photos on supported iPhones.
• Optimized for All iOS Devices: Compatible with iPad Pro, iPhone SE, iPhone 8, and newer models in both landscape and portrait modes.
• Multiple Viewing Options: Choose from EXIF Cards List View, Grid View, or Map View to suit your preference.
• Photos Extension: Access EXIF data directly within the native Photos app or third-party apps by selecting the photo and tapping the Share button to choose the EXIF Viewer extension.
• iMessage App Support: Effortlessly view and share EXIF data in your messages.

Editing and Removing EXIF Metadata:
• Bulk Edit EXIF Data: Select multiple photos, tap “Edit EXIF,” and update metadata such as date and location.
• Remove EXIF Metadata:
    1.    Overwrite the original photo to eliminate EXIF metadata.
    2.    Create a duplicate photo without EXIF data, with an option to delete the original photo.

FAQ
What is EXIF Metadata?
EXIF stands for EXchangeable Image File Format. When you take pictures with your digital camera or phone, a considerable amount of EXIF data is recorded and stored within each image. This data includes information about your camera settings (ISO, focal length, image size, shutter speed, camera model, lens model, GPS), date, time, location, and more. Viewing EXIF metadata tags is crucial for both beginners and professional photographers to understand and review the camera settings or software used to create and edit a photo.

Why Choose EXIF Viewer by Fluntro?
• No In-App Purchases: Enjoy all current and future features with the initial purchase—no hidden costs.
• Designed for Professional Photographers: Gain deep insights into your photography work and protect your privacy by removing sensitive metadata.
• Privacy First: Your photos are securely stored locally on your phone and never uploaded to our servers. Learn more in our Privacy Policy.

User Reviews:
If you’re satisfied with the app, please consider leaving a 5-star review. Your feedback helps us improve and ensures the best experience for all users.

tr.description:
Solo is the ultimate practice App for mastering fretboard visualization, designed by world renowned guitarists Tom Quayle and David Beebee.

Four powerful fretboard trainers allow you to work intuitively on each aspect of the visualization process; learning note names, memorising interval shapes, outlining chord changes, and practicing scales.

Solo asks you to find intervallic functions against one root note, chord symbol or scale at a time, listens to the notes you play, and doesn’t move on until you’ve correctly found each note by its intervallic function in the specified order.

Practice with Solo and finally learn your note names, master interval shapes, confidently play through chord changes and break out of scale boxes with intervallic functions. Start transforming your playing and confidence on the fretboard today!


NOTE TRAINER
The Note Trainer is perfect for beginner and intermediate players getting to grips with note names on the neck - the foundation of solid fretboard knowledge. 

‣ Solo shows you random root notes to find and listens, waiting for you to get it correct.
‣ Slide on the interactive fretboards for helpful diagrams and to study alternative options. Choose from 6 string guitar (standard and 4ths tuning), 7 string guitar, 4 string bass & 5 string bass.
‣ Optional practice suggestions offer challenging ways to limit and test yourself.
‣ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session.


INTERVAL TRAINER
The Interval Trainer will help players at all levels work on interval shapes with intervallic functions - the key to unlocking true freedom on the fretboard.

‣ Choose any combination of intervallic functions to practice.
‣ Create custom interval groups or choose the intervals for ANY chord type or scale.
‣ The Interval Trainer will randomise your chosen intervals and ask you to find them against either a fixed or random root note.
‣ Slide on the interactive fretboards for helpful diagrams, showing you where all of the interval shapes are across the neck, and to study alternative options. Choose from 6 string guitar (standard and 4ths tuning), 7 string guitar, 4 string bass & 5 string bass.
‣ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session.


CHANGES TRAINER
In the Changes Trainer you find intervallic functions, using single notes to outline different chord types or sets of chord changes, a key skill for learning to improvise through chord changes.  

‣ Practice outlining intervallic functions through over 100 common chord progressions and single chord exercises.
‣ 50 intervallic function levels. Go from simple chord tones to complex melodic structures and scales. 
‣ Solo intelligently maps out the correct intervals over each chord and listens for you to play each intervallic function in the specified order.
‣ Powerful workout options provide almost limitless ways to challenge yourself.
‣ Transpose the key of any progression or exercise. 
‣ Choose to randomly transpose the progression (or single chord exercise) each time it repeats.
‣ Work on voice leading chord tones through single note lines.


SCALE TRAINER
The Scale Trainer contains a vast array of scales and powerful workout options, allowing you to finally break out of the box and develop a much deeper understanding of how scales are constructed on the fretboard.

‣ Practice finding scales on the fretboard using intervallic functions. 
‣ Over 50+ Scales and modes.
‣ Powerful workout options provide almost limitless ways to challenge yourself.
‣ Melodic sequence options let you focus on starting from any chord tone within the scale.
‣ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session.

tr.description:
Unlock your creative potential! Discover how to easily turn any Sun, Moon and Milky Way scene you imagine into a real picture… and start shooting truly legendary photos every time you pick up the camera!

Whether your passion is to capture beautiful landscapes, immortalize the infinite night sky, surprise the bride and the groom in their happiest day... or to travel the world, PhotoPills will make you love exploring new artistic possibilities to tell visual stories in a way it wasn’t possible before.

* All in one app
PhotoPills is your iPhone and iPad personal assistant in all photographic matters. It provides tasty remedies to answer most of the questions when planning and shooting your creative ideas: 
- The First 2D Map-Centric Planner: Sun, Moon, Milky Way
- Sun, Moon Alignments Fast Finder
- 3D Augmented Reality: Sun, Moon, Milky Way, Celestial Equator, Polaris, DoF, FoV
- Photo Plans Manager
- Location Scouting Tool
- Key information: Sunrise/set, Twilights, Golden Hour, Blue Hour, Moonrise/set, Supermoon dates, Moon Calendar
- Calculators: Long Exposure, Timelapse, Spot Stars, Star Trails, Hyperfocal Table, DoF, FoV
- Widgets: Sun, Moon, Milky Way
- PhotoPills Awards… and much more!

* Endorsed by Masters
“PhotoPills is an invaluable tool which I use every time I plan a shoot.” – Mark Gee, Astronomy Photographer of the Year.
“A tool every photographer should have.” – Kevin Raber, Luminous-landscape.com.
“It pays off! Using such a tool ensures that we are repeatedly capable of quickly planning powerful shots; leaving maximum opportunity for more creative ruminations.” – José B. Ruiz, Innovation Award, Wildlife Photographer of the Year.

* How it works
Have you ever walked around a place and thought: "What a pity the Moon isn't EXACTLY right there... I would have captured a great photo!"? What about the Sun? And the Milky Way? Well, now you can let your imagination fly and calculate when this specific magic moment happens in just a few seconds:
- IMAGINE: the Milky Way arching over a powerful landscape, a giant full Moon appearing from behind a nearby hill or a sunset between two rocks on a magic beach... The only limit is your imagination!
- PLAN: easily calculate the exact date and time the scene you’ve imagined happens. Work smarter, not harder! 
- SHOOT: just get out there, immerse yourself in the great outdoors, and enjoy living and capturing unique moments.

* Become a Legend
Because we know the huge amount of time, energy and love you put in your photos. We want to HONOR them, SHOW them to the World, and REWARD you with up to $6,600 in cash prizes. It's easy and FREE! Just submit your creative photos from PhotoPills and join the Legacy!

* Never waste an unmissable scene again
Create a To-Do list of planned photos and get to the location on time. 

* Get it right
Adjust your frame for the best composition before you shoot. Use the 3D Augmented Reality Views to see whether Sun, Moon and Milky Way will be at the desired position when pressing the shutter.

* Explore, discover great places and create your own database of locations
If you come across a location you’d like to remember, save it as a Point of Interest.

* Enjoy all daily information in just one swipe with the Widgets
Just swipe down from the top of the screen to get all the Sun, Moon and Milky Way events for your current location and date, in addition to your upcoming photo plans.

* Get more than an app
Our goal is not only to help you plan your shots, but also to help you nail them. Whenever you need help, take a look at our How-To articles and videos, join our free online courses or just contact us!

“This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You take the blue pill – the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take PhotoPills – you stay in Wonderland and we show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes. Remember: all we’re offering are Legendary Photos and Goosebumps in your skin, nothing more.”

tr.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

tr.description:
Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors.

UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES
Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat.

WHAT IT DOES
• Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around
• Custom redirects (e.g. reddit → old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns
• Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them
• Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services
• Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more

WHY IT'S USEFUL
Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services.

TRACKING BLOCKER
Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices.

URL REDIRECTS
Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported.

SEARCH ARCHIVE
One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device.

iCLOUD SYNC
Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, and tweaks sync automatically and immediately. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere (statistics remain device-specific).

BROWSER TWEAKS
Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere.

KEY FEATURES
• Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac
• Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection)
• Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity
• Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically
• Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps
• Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules
• Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users
• Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering
• Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity
• Works offline - no internet connection required

DESIGN PRINCIPLES
Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms.

IMPORTANT NOTES
Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental.

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK
Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues

PRIVACY
No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device.

EULA
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE?
Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

tr.description:
A remodeled 2D take on the fourth game in the world-renowned FINAL FANTASY series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics. All the magic of the original, with improved ease of play.

The Kingdom of Baron sent their elite airship fleet, the Red Wings, to attack the surrounding countries. Distressed by his mission, Cecil, a dark knight and captain of the Red Wings, decides to fight against the tyrannical Baron with his trusted friend and his paramour at his side. In his search for the crystals, Cecil must travel over land, under the ground, to the Land of Summons, and even to the moon. Join forces with Kain the dragoon, Rosa the white mage, Rydia the summoner, and many more skilled allies.

FFIV is the first title to introduce the dynamic "Active Time Battle" system, where time moves even during battle, giving the players an exciting sense of urgency.Thanks to the wide appeal of the game, this revolutionary system would be implemented in many future titles in the series.

Witness the dramatic story and dynamic battles in this fourth installment of the FINAL FANTASY series!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

■ Beautifully revived with new graphics and sound!
・Universally updated 2D pixel graphics, including the iconic FINAL FANTASY character pixel designs created by Kazuko Shibuya, the original artist and current collaborator.
・Beautifully rearranged soundtrack in a faithful FINAL FANTASY style, overseen by original composer Nobuo Uematsu.

■Improved gameplay!
・Including modernized UI, auto-battle options, and more.
・Also supports game pad controls, making it possible to play using a dedicated gamepad UI when connecting a gamepad to your device.
・Switch the soundtrack between the rearranged version, created for the pixel remaster, or the original version, capturing the sound of the original game.
・Now possible to switch between different fonts, including the default font and a pixel-based font based on the atmosphere of the original game.
・Additional boost features to expand gameplay options, including switching off random encounters and adjusting experience gained multipliers between 0 and 4.
・Dive into the world of the game with supplemental extras like the bestiary, illustration gallery, and music player.

*One-time purchase. The app will not require any additional payments to play through the game after the initial purchase and subsequent download.
*This remaster is based on the original "FINAL FANTASY IV" game released in 1991. Features and/or content may differ from previously rereleased versions of the game.

[OS Compatibility]
iOS 13.0 or higher

[Applicable Devices]
iPhone 7 Plus, iPad (7th generation), iPad Air (3rd generation), iPad mini (5th generation) and higher

tr.description:
A remodeled 2D take on the fifth game in the world-renowned FINAL FANTASY series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics. All the magic of the original, with improved ease of play.

The King of Tycoon has sensed a disturbance in the wind. When the crystals that balance the powers of the world are threatened, the king hastens to the rescue...only to go missing. Somewhere a young man and his Chocobo find themselves drawn toward friends that will change their destiny.

Building on the job systems of previous games, FFV includes a diverse selection of jobs to try, and a unique ability system that lets you combine skills.

Develop your characters with free reign, and master your battle tactics in the fifth installment of the FINAL FANTASY series!

----------------------------------------------------------------------

■ Beautifully revived with new graphics and sound!
・Universally updated 2D pixel graphics, including the iconic FINAL FANTASY character pixel designs created by Kazuko Shibuya, the original artist and current collaborator.
・Beautifully rearranged soundtrack in a faithful FINAL FANTASY style, overseen by original composer Nobuo Uematsu.

■Improved gameplay!
・Including modernized UI, auto-battle options, and more.
・Also supports game pad controls, making it possible to play using a dedicated gamepad UI when connecting a gamepad to your device.
・Switch the soundtrack between the rearranged version, created for the pixel remaster, or the original version, capturing the sound of the original game.
・Now possible to switch between different fonts, including the default font and a pixel-based font based on the atmosphere of the original game.
・Additional boost features to expand gameplay options, including switching off random encounters and adjusting experience gained multipliers between 0 and 4.
・Dive into the world of the game with supplemental extras like the bestiary, illustration gallery, and music player.

*One-time purchase. The app will not require any additional payments to play through the game after the initial purchase and subsequent download.
*This remaster is based on the original "FINAL FANTASY V" game released in 1992. Features and/or content may differ from previously rereleased versions of the game.

[OS Compatibility]
iOS 13.0 or higher

[Applicable Devices]

iPhone 7 Plus, iPad (7th generation), iPad Air (3rd generation), iPad mini (5th generation) and higher

The War of the Magi caused magic to disappear from the world. A thousand years later, humanity relies on machines - until they find a young woman with mysterious powers. The magicite system allows players to customize which abilities, magic spells, and summons the party members learn. All the playable characters have their own stories, goals, and destinies. Journey through their interwoven fates in this sweeping melodrama.

The pinnacle of the FF series at the time of its release, FFVI remains critically acclaimed and beloved to this day.

Heróis, seu Exército, Inimigos e lendárias tower defense lutas de chefe!

pt.description:
想系統的學習日語嗎? 那就從這開始吧。 

本軟體是一款學習類應用，循序漸進的收錄了25課初級有聲課程和25課進階有聲教程，包含單詞,句型,會話,語法和課後聽力五個部分，音頻和視頻全部高清重制。通過手機的移動性便攜性，幫助各界朋友隨時隨地的學習和查閱教材的內容，使各個層次的學習者都能夠迅速的強化日語的聽說讀寫能力。 

在每課的單詞部分，會有對該課單詞的簡單練習，可以順序或隨機的進行日譯中,中譯日或聽力測試,對單詞的記憶有著非常好的幫助。 每個單詞均支持3D按壓，可以通過按壓進行在線翻譯。

所有單詞可按五星等級進行收藏，方便您經常摘錄重點或難以記憶的單詞,以便反復練習和查閱。 支持單詞收藏雲同步，可以讓您在不同設備之間無縫切換。
     
會話可隱藏指定角色對話內容來進行角色扮演。另附有真人視頻增強日語學習語境。 
       
全文朗讀功能，可一鍵朗讀課文的單詞、文型、例文、會話部分，方便在出門或忙碌時練習聽力。可線控暫停和繼續播放，可線控進行下一段和上一段跳轉。 

支持Spotlight，可在手機主頁直接下拉搜索欄進行單詞搜索並直接跳轉。

願這款軟體能夠幫助各界朋友愉快的系統的學習日語。 
       
主要功能: 
1. 系統的,循序漸進的學習初級日語 
2. 分為單詞,句型,會話,語法和課後聽力五個部分
3. 單詞,句型,會話和聽力均配有真人高質量發音
4. 靈活的單詞收藏和練習功能
5. 自動和手動的會話朗讀模式
6. 會話的角色扮演功能以模擬對話場景
7. 會話附有視頻以增強日語學習語境
8. 一鍵朗讀課文全部內容,待機時也可練習聽力
9. 超強的線控功能 
10. 超詳細的單詞翻譯引擎
11. 支持繁體中文和簡體中文

pt.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action / bullet-hell roguelite where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 130 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with 13 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 13 unique characters!

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over 130 unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villain to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours! Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

pt.description:
Destacado pela Apple na App Store dos EUA e do Canadá. Aproveite uma compra única com acesso vitalício — sem necessidade de assinatura.
EXIF Viewer by Fluntro é a ferramenta definitiva para fotógrafos profissionais e entusiastas do iPhone visualizarem, gerenciarem e editarem metadados EXIF. Com um design elegante e funcionalidade fluida, este aplicativo oferece uma experiência harmoniosa em todos os seus dispositivos iOS (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch).

Principais Funcionalidades:
• Remover Metadados EXIF e Geotags: Proteja sua privacidade ao excluir dados EXIF, incluindo localização GPS.
• Visualizar Dados EXIF Detalhados: Acesse facilmente metadados essenciais como ISO, Velocidade do Obturador, Distância Focal, Modelo da Câmera, Modelo da Lente, Data e Hora, Abertura, e muito mais de qualquer foto em seu dispositivo, iCloud ou Foto Stream.
• Ampliar Fotos Grandes: Aproveite imagens em alta resolução (até 80 MB) com clareza cristalina.
• Personalizar suas Tags EXIF: Personalize sua visualização ao reordenar as tags EXIF, ocultar tags indesejadas e escolher seu formato de data preferido.
• Navegação Rápida: Deslize suavemente para a esquerda ou direita para navegar entre fotos na tela de detalhes EXIF.
• Visualização de Mapa: Visualize suas fotos em um mapa com informações EXIF detalhadas acessíveis ao tocar em cada foto.
• Edição em Massa de Dados EXIF: Modifique os metadados EXIF de várias fotos de forma eficiente, incluindo alterações de data e localização.
• Compartilhar Fotos com ou sem EXIF: Compartilhe fotos via e-mail, AirDrop ou outros métodos, com ou sem os metadados EXIF.
• Copiar Dados EXIF: Copie e compartilhe metadados facilmente entre apps.
• Manter Metadados EXIF: Fotos enviadas via Mail, AirDrop ou leitores de cartão SD mantêm os metadados EXIF, diferente de muitos aplicativos de mensagens e redes sociais.

Funcionalidades Adicionais:
• Otimizado para Todos os Dispositivos iOS: Compatível com iPad Pro, iPhone SE, iPhone 8 e modelos mais recentes em modo paisagem e retrato.
• Várias Opções de Visualização: Escolha entre o modo Lista de Cartões EXIF, Modo Grade ou Modo Mapa, conforme sua preferência.
• Extensão de Fotos: Acesse dados EXIF diretamente no aplicativo Fotos nativo ou em aplicativos de terceiros ao selecionar a foto e tocar no botão Compartilhar para escolher a extensão EXIF Viewer.
• Suporte para App iMessage: Visualize e compartilhe dados EXIF facilmente nas suas mensagens.

Edição e Remoção de Metadados EXIF:
• Edição em Massa de Dados EXIF: Selecione várias fotos, toque em “Editar EXIF” e atualize metadados como data e localização.
• Remover Metadados EXIF:
    1.Sobrescreva a foto original para remover os metadados EXIF.
    2.Crie uma foto duplicada sem os dados EXIF, com a opção de excluir a foto original.

Perguntas Frequentes
O que são Metadados EXIF?
EXIF significa Formato de Arquivo de Imagem Intercambiável (Exchangeable Image File Format). Quando você tira fotos com sua câmera digital ou telefone, uma grande quantidade de dados EXIF é gravada e armazenada em cada imagem. Esses dados incluem informações sobre as configurações da câmera (ISO, abertura, distância focal, tamanho da imagem, velocidade do obturador, modelo da câmera, modelo da lente, GPS), data, hora, localização e muito mais. Ver as tags de metadados EXIF é essencial para fotógrafos iniciantes e profissionais entenderem e revisarem as configurações da câmera ou o software usado para criar e editar uma foto.

Por que escolher o EXIF Viewer by Fluntro?
• Sem Compras no Aplicativo: Aproveite todas as funcionalidades atuais e futuras com a compra inicial — sem custos ocultos.
• Projetado para Fotógrafos Profissionais: Obtenha insights profundos sobre seu trabalho fotográfico e proteja sua privacidade ao remover metadados sensíveis.
• Privacidade em Primeiro Lugar: Suas fotos são armazenadas localmente no seu telefone de forma segura e nunca são enviadas para nossos servidores. Saiba mais na nossa Política de Privacidade.

pt.description:
Solo is the ultimate practice App for mastering fretboard visualization, designed by world renowned guitarists Tom Quayle and David Beebee.

Four powerful fretboard trainers allow you to work intuitively on each aspect of the visualization process; learning note names, memorising interval shapes, outlining chord changes, and practicing scales.

Solo asks you to find intervallic functions against one root note, chord symbol or scale at a time, listens to the notes you play, and doesn’t move on until you’ve correctly found each note by its intervallic function in the specified order.

Practice with Solo and finally learn your note names, master interval shapes, confidently play through chord changes and break out of scale boxes with intervallic functions. Start transforming your playing and confidence on the fretboard today!


NOTE TRAINER
The Note Trainer is perfect for beginner and intermediate players getting to grips with note names on the neck - the foundation of solid fretboard knowledge. 

‣ Solo shows you random root notes to find and listens, waiting for you to get it correct.
‣ Slide on the interactive fretboards for helpful diagrams and to study alternative options. Choose from 6 string guitar (standard and 4ths tuning), 7 string guitar, 4 string bass & 5 string bass.
‣ Optional practice suggestions offer challenging ways to limit and test yourself.
‣ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session.


INTERVAL TRAINER
The Interval Trainer will help players at all levels work on interval shapes with intervallic functions - the key to unlocking true freedom on the fretboard.

‣ Choose any combination of intervallic functions to practice.
‣ Create custom interval groups or choose the intervals for ANY chord type or scale.
‣ The Interval Trainer will randomise your chosen intervals and ask you to find them against either a fixed or random root note.
‣ Slide on the interactive fretboards for helpful diagrams, showing you where all of the interval shapes are across the neck, and to study alternative options. Choose from 6 string guitar (standard and 4ths tuning), 7 string guitar, 4 string bass & 5 string bass.
‣ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session.


CHANGES TRAINER
In the Changes Trainer you find intervallic functions, using single notes to outline different chord types or sets of chord changes, a key skill for learning to improvise through chord changes.  

‣ Practice outlining intervallic functions through over 100 common chord progressions and single chord exercises.
‣ 50 intervallic function levels. Go from simple chord tones to complex melodic structures and scales. 
‣ Solo intelligently maps out the correct intervals over each chord and listens for you to play each intervallic function in the specified order.
‣ Powerful workout options provide almost limitless ways to challenge yourself.
‣ Transpose the key of any progression or exercise. 
‣ Choose to randomly transpose the progression (or single chord exercise) each time it repeats.
‣ Work on voice leading chord tones through single note lines.


SCALE TRAINER
The Scale Trainer contains a vast array of scales and powerful workout options, allowing you to finally break out of the box and develop a much deeper understanding of how scales are constructed on the fretboard.

‣ Practice finding scales on the fretboard using intervallic functions. 
‣ Over 50+ Scales and modes.
‣ Powerful workout options provide almost limitless ways to challenge yourself.
‣ Melodic sequence options let you focus on starting from any chord tone within the scale.
‣ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session.

pt.description:
Não importa o tipo de fotografia que você ama: Paisagens, Via Láctea, Lua, Nascer e Pôr do Sol, Arquitetura, Rastro de Estrelas, Drone, Chuvas de Meteoros, Eclipse solar, Eclipse Lunar, Time Lapse, Casamento, Retrato ou viagem …

Você está prestes a descobrir como planejar as suas ideias de fotografias… assim você vai tirar fotos realmente legendárias cada vez que pegar a câmera!

Porque estar no lugar certo na hora certa para capturar a foto que você deseja é impagável.

* Tudo em um só aplicativo (+400,000 downloads)
PhotoPills é o seu aplicativo de fotografia para tudo. PhotoPills é o seu:
- Aplicativo para planejamento, para o nascer e pôr do Sol, para a hora dourada, para a hora azul, Via Láctea, Lua, chuva de meteoros, eclipse lunar e solar, rastro de estrelas, profundidade de campo, filtro ND , longa exposição, campo de visão, timelapse…
- Localizador de sol, Lua e Via Láctea
- Ralidade aumentada: sol, Lua, Via Láctea, rastro de estrelas, estrela polar, profundidade de campo, campo de visão.
** NOTA: a Realidade Aumentada usa a bússola do seu dispositivo. Alguns dispositivos podem não ter uma bússola.
- Gerenciador de planos.
- Ferramenta para explorar locais.
- E muito mais!

* Aprovado por mestres de fotografia
“PhotoPills é uma ferramenta inestimável que uso sempre que planejo uma foto.” - Mark Gee, fotógrafo de astronomia do ano
“Uma ferramenta que todo fotógrafo deve ter.” - Kevin Raber, Luminous-landscape.com.
""Vale a pena! Uma ferramenta dessas garante que sejamos capazes de planejar fotos incríveis“. - José B. Ruiz, Fotógrafo de vida selvagem do ano.

* Como funciona
Você já andou por um lugar e pensou: """"Que pena que a Lua não esteja EXATAMENTE ali … eu teria tirado uma ótima foto!""""? E o Sol? E a Via Láctea? Bem, agora você pode deixar sua imaginação voar e calcular quando esse momento mágico acontece:
- IMAGINE a Via Láctea arqueando-se sobre uma paisagem incrível, uma Lua cheia gigante aparecendo por trás de uma colina próxima ou um pôr do sol entre duas pedras em uma praia mágica… Dê asas a sua imaginação!
- PLANEJE calculando facilmente a data e hora exatas da cena que você imaginou. Trabalhe com mais inteligência, não mais tempo!
- FOTOGRAFE enquanto vivencia e captura momentos únicos.

* Inspire-se e ganhe destaque
PhotoPills é uma comunidade extremamente ativa. Todos os dias, apresentamos em nosso Instagram e nas fotos do PhotoPills o que os PhotoPillers IMAGINAM, PLANEJAM e FOTOGRAFAM para que você possa se inspirar. Sempre que você capturar uma foto bacana, envie-a para o PhotoPills Awards - e seja premiado!

* Nunca perca uma cena única
Crie uma lista de tarefas planejadas, adicione alertas ao seu calendário e chegue ao local a tempo.

* Faça certo
Ajuste o enquadramento para obter a melhor composição antes de fotografar. Use Realidade Aumentada para ver se o Sol, a Lua e / ou a Via Láctea estarão na posição desejada ao pressionar o obturador.

* Explore, descubra lugares incríveis e crie seu próprio banco de dados de locais
Se você se deparar com um local que gostaria de lembrar, salve-o como um ponto de interesse.

* Tenha informações diárias em apenas um toque com os Widgets
Use os Widgets para obter rapidamente todos os principais eventos do sol, da Lua e da Via Láctea para sua localização e data atuais, além de seus próximos planos fotográficos.

* Melhore sua fotografia
Nosso objetivo não é apenas ajudá-lo a planejar suas fotos, mas também ajudá-lo a corrigi-las. Sempre que precisar de ajuda, consulte nossos artigos e vídeos de instruções ou envie-nos um e-mail!

""Esta é a sua última chance. Depois disso, não há como voltar atrás. Você toma a pílula azul - a história termina, você acorda na sua cama e acredita no que quiser acreditar. Você toma PhotoPills - fica no País das Maravilhas e nós mostramos a profundidade da toca do coelho. Lembre-se: tudo o que oferecemos são fotos legendárias e arrepios na pele, nada mais. ""

Junte-se a nós… Vai ser DIVERTIDO!

Game Content
Ultimate Mission Mode
Relive the stories and famous battles from Naruto's childhood! You can freely move around the Hidden Leaf Village and take on missions and mini games!

Free Battle Mode
In Free Battle Mode, you can choose from 25 unique characters from Naruto's childhood and 10 support characters to enjoy a variety of powerful ninjutsu actions and battles! 

Changes for the App
Easily activate ninjutsu, ultimate jutsu, and other actions with a tap! Even those playing the series for the first time can confidently enjoy the game!
Plus, the following additional features and improvements have made the game easier to play:
- New auto-save feature
- New control mode selection for battle (casual/manual)
- New battle assist feature (casual only)
- Improved controls for battle and free movement
- New retry feature for missions
- Improved mini-game UI
- Improved tutorial

Play Notes
- This game contains violent content.

pt.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

pt.description:
Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors.

UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES
Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat.

WHAT IT DOES
• Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around
• Custom redirects (e.g. reddit → old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns
• Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them
• Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services
• Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more

WHY IT'S USEFUL
Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services.

TRACKING BLOCKER
Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices.

URL REDIRECTS
Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported.

SEARCH ARCHIVE
One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device.

iCLOUD SYNC
Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, and tweaks sync automatically and immediately. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere (statistics remain device-specific).

BROWSER TWEAKS
Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere.

KEY FEATURES
• Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac
• Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection)
• Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity
• Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically
• Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps
• Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules
• Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users
• Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering
• Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity
• Works offline - no internet connection required

DESIGN PRINCIPLES
Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms.

IMPORTANT NOTES
Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental.

SUPPORT & FEEDBACK
Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues

PRIVACY
No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device.

EULA
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE?
Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

pt.description:
Uma versão 2D remodelada do quarto jogo da grandiosa série FINAL FANTASY! Aproveite a clássica história contada com um nostálgico visual retrô. Toda a magia do original, agora mais acessível.

O rei de Baron enviou sua força aérea de elite, os Asas Vermelhas, para atacar os reinos vizinhos. Cecil, um cavaleiro das trevas e capitão dos Asas Vermelhas, fica angustiado com a missão e decide enfrentar a tirania de Baron ao lado de seu leal amigo e de sua amada. Cecil viajará pela terra, pelo subterrâneo, à Terra dos Eidolons, e até mesmo à lua em busca dos cristais. Junte-se ao cavaleiro-dragão Kain, à maga branca Rosa, à invocadora Rydia e a vários outros aliados habilidosos.

FFIV é o primeiro da série a introduzir o dinâmico sistema de Batalha de Tempo Ativo, no qual o tempo não para mesmo durante o combate e dá aos jogadores a eletrizante sensação de urgência. Devido ao grande sucesso do jogo, este revolucionário sistema foi implementado em vários títulos subsequentes da série.

Não perca a dramática história e as batalhas dinâmicas do quarto jogo da série FINAL FANTASY!

---------------------------------------------

■ Lindamente reanimados com novos gráficos e sons!
・Gráficos pixelados 2D totalmente atualizados, incluindo os icônicos designs em pixel dos personagens de FINAL FANTASY criados por Kazuko Shibuya, o artista original e atual colaborador.
・Trilha sonora com novos arranjos belíssimos, fieis ao estilo de FINAL FANTASY, supervisionada pelo compositor original, Nobuo Uematsu.

■ Melhor jogabilidade!
・Inclui IU modernizada, opções de batalha automática e mais.
・Compatível com o uso de controles, incluindo uma interface dedicada para conectar um controle ao dispositivo.
・Alterne a trilha sonora entre a versão rearranjada, criada para a versão pixel remasterizada, e a versão original, que captura o som do jogo original.
・Agora é possível alternar entre diferentes fontes, incluindo a fonte padrão e uma fonte de pixel condizente com a atmosfera do jogo original.
・Com recursos aprimorados para expandir as opções de jogabilidade, incluindo a desativação de encontros aleatórios e ajuste de multiplicadores de experiência obtida entre 0 e 4.
・Mergulhe no mundo do jogo com extras complementares, como bestiário, galeria de ilustrações e reprodutor de música.

*Compra única. Não há pagamentos adicionais ao longo do jogo após a compra inicial e o subsequente download.
*Esta versão remaster se baseia no jogo "FINAL FANTASY IV" original lançado em 1991. Alguns recursos e/ou parte do conteúdo podem ser diferentes de versões relançadas anteriormente.

[Compatibilidade com sistema operacional]
iOS 13.0 ou superior

[Dispositivos aplicáveis]
iPhone 7 Plus, iPad (7ª geração), iPad Air (3ª geração), iPad mini (5ª geração) e posteriores

pt.description:
Uma versão 2D remodelada do sexto jogo da grandiosa série FINAL FANTASY! Aproveite a clássica história contada com um nostálgico visual retrô. Toda a magia do original, agora mais acessível.

A Guerra dos Magi fez com que a magia desaparecesse do mundo. Mil anos depois, a humanidade depende de máquinas, até que uma jovem com poderes misteriosos é encontrada. Personalize as habilidades, magias e invocações que os membros do grupo aprendem com o sistema de magicita. Cada personagem jogável tem sua própria história, objetivos e motivações. Acompanhe a jornada dos destinos entrelaçados deles neste drama épico e envolvente. 

Revisite o aclamado FFVI nesta versão remasterizada, incluindo a cultuada e icônica cena da ópera, agora ainda mais encantadora, com novos vocais e animações.
